trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Dowagiac
There were no other sightings in Dowagiac on or around June 15th 1978
Summary: It was spring with some cloud in sky it was clear to see.
divs: Sighting Detailsthe babyseter call us over she herd a noies . as we walk back home. me & mom saw lightes in sky. they were four of them . the colores were red , blue , green & yellow. the lightes were about a 100 yard away from us i think . about the some high we saw a airplan light stop in the air. the four lightes some to hold the airplan . my mom had flashlight. she put the light on the ufo two time. like a flash it was gone. the airplan take off.we were scad of it. i did my best to it righ
